column1: 0501|one minute past five|Oh yes. His clocks were set at one minute past five
column2: four minutes past five and seven minutes past five. That was the combination number of a safe
column3: 515457. The safe was concealed behind a reproduction of the Mona Lisa. Inside the safe
column6: "were the Crown Jewels of the Russian Royal Family."

column1: 0501|after five o'clock|Just after five o'clock on this chill September morning
column3: containing Kirsten and Emilia and such possessions as they have been able to assemble in the time allowed to them
column4: is driven out of the gates of Rosenborg?
